TABLE.NAME: qtype_opaque_engines
TABLE.COMMENT: Remote engines that the Opaque question type can connect to. Each engine will comprise one or more servers stored in the qtype_opaque_servers table

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id used to identify the engine.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name used to identify this engine in the interface.

FIELD.NAME: passkey
FIELD.COMMENT: The passkey for the QE if required.

FIELD.NAME: timeout
FIELD.COMMENT: The connection timeout, in seconds, to use when connecting to this engine.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: qtype_opaque_servers
TABLE.COMMENT: This table stores the individual servers that make up an Opaque remote engine.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id used to identify the server.

FIELD.NAME: engineid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Opaque engine this server is part of.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of this server - question engine or question bank.

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The base URL of this server.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: qtype_opaque_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Extra infomation required to define an Opaque question. This table extends the question table.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the qtype_opaque_options row. Not very significant. The questionid column is a more meaningful key.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the question this row relates to.

FIELD.NAME: engineid
FIELD.COMMENT: The remote engine that provides this question. Refers to question_opaaque_engines.id.

FIELD.NAME: remoteid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of this question - meaningful to the remote engine.

FIELD.NAME: remoteversion
FIELD.COMMENT: The version of this question - meaningful to the remote engine.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me
